instruction.value: Apply to affected skin area for 60 minutes prior to procedure.
Apply to affected skin area(s) for 60 minutes prior to procedure.

additionalnotes.value: NEONATES / INFANTS: up to 3 months of age or less than 5 kg body weight.
INFANTS: 3 to 12 months of age and greater than 5 kg body weight. Recommend no more than 2 patches applied at same time.
CHILDREN: 1 to 6 years of age and greater than 10 kg body weight.
CHILDREN: 7 to 12 years of age and greater than 20 kg body weight.

ahfsname.value: Skin and Mucous Membrane Agents, Antipruritics and Local Anesthetics
